  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/952</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/952</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Bromatquim: anàlisi química dels aliments</string>
            <string language="en">Bromatquim: chemical analysis of food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bromatquim: chemische Analyse der Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bromatquim : analyse chimique de 
nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bromatquim: análise química do alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bromatquim: analisi chimica di alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Bromatquim: χημική ανάλυση των τροφίμων</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Materials i recursos informatius sobre la didàctica i l'aprenentatge de l'anàlisi química dels aliments. Conté un apartat de pràctiques amb 52 protocols d'anàlisi, una introducció a l'anàlisi química instrumental, enllaços externs i un bloc. També hi ha la versió castellana.</string>
            <string language="en">Materials and resources on the teaching and learning of the chemical analysis of food. A section with 52 analysis protocols, an introduction to instrumental chemical analysis, links, and a log are included. There is also a Spanish version.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">experiment</string>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
            <string language="es">experimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia alimentària</string>
            <string language="en">food technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnología alimentaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tècnica</string>
            <string language="en">technique</string>
            <string language="es">técnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Materialien und Betriebsmittel auf dem Unterricht
und dem Lernen der chemischen Analyse der Nahrung. Ein Kapitel 
mit 52 Analyse Protokollen, eine Einleitung in eine instrumentelle 
chemische Analyse, Links und ein Protokoll sind enthalten. Es 
gibt auch eine spanische Version.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériaux et ressources sur l'enseignement et 
l'étude de l'analyse chimique de la nourriture. Une section 
avec 52 protocoles d'analyse, une introduction à l'analyse chimique 
instrumentale, les liens, et un logarithme naturel sont inclus. 
Il y a également une version espagnole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Materiais e recursos no ensino e na aprendizagem 
da análise química do alimento. Uma seção com 52 protocolos 
da análise, uma introdução à análise química instrumental, as 
ligações, e um registro são incluídos. Há também uma 
versão espanhola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali e risorse sull'insegnamento e 
sull'imparare dell'analisi chimica di alimento. Una sezione con 
52 protocolli di analisi, un'introduzione ad analisi chimica 
strumentale, i collegamenti e un libro macchina sono inclusi. Ci
è egualmente una versione spagnola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικά και στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς στη διδασκαλία και την
εκμάθηση της χημικής ανάλυσης των τροφίμων. Ένα τμήμα με 
52 πρωτόκολλα ανάλυσης, μια εισαγωγή στην οργανική χημική 
ανάλυση, οι συνδέσεις, και ένα κούτσουρο συμπεριλαμβάνονται. 
Υπάρχει επίσης μια ισπανική εκδοχή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmitteltechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expérience</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie alimentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">experiência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia de alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">técnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia dell'alimentazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πείραμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογία τροφίμων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
